Sentencas: The novelty of this paper is to utilize waste heat from the gas turbine is used to minimize the temperature gradient in SOFC.

Sentencas: Additionally, the impact of pressure ratio and turbine inlet temperature (TIT) will be discussed in a novel perspective with the help of an unique performance plot.
